ConnectionTemplate.Name: SQLServer
ConnectionTemplate.Template: Data Source={DbServer}; Initial Catalog={Database}; Integrated Security=True

ConnectionTemplate.Name: OLEDB
ConnectionTemplate.Template: Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source={DbServer}\instance; Initial Catalog ={Database}; User Id=myUsername; Password=myPassword

ConnectionTemplate.Name: Access
ConnectionTemplate.Template: Provider=Microsoft.ACE.OLEDB.12.0; Data Source=C:\myAccessFile.accdb;Persist Security Info = False;

ConnectionTemplate.Name: ODBC
ConnectionTemplate.Template: Driver={SQL Server}; Server=myServerAddress; Database=myDataBase; Uid = myUsername; Pwd = myPassword;
